text: @lxlxleee @coltman_paul @ProfKarolSikora What is the solution then? Can't go for herd immunity it would kill too many based on a 0.5-1% IFR , can't rely on a vaccine that may or may not come, does aggressive track and trace actually work? I'm not sure it does. I think it's the asymptomatic spreaders that are the problem
